thread.title: We Need To Talk About Beyoncé's Grammy Performance
thread.title_full: We Need To Talk About Beyoncé's Grammy Performance

author: Billy Lorusso
title: We Need To Talk About Beyoncé's Grammy Performance
text:
View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Getty Images Remember when she went a the way out and announced her first pregnancy during her performance at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards??
ID: 10515780 2. Whether she’s singing at an award show, performing at a presidential inauguration ball, or headlining the mother effin’ Super Bowl, our girl knows how to put on a killer show. View this image ›
Matt Cowan / Getty Images ID: 10515803 3. Well, needless to say, her performance at tonight’s Grammys was an absolute spectacle: So fucking dramatic, so fucking amazing, and so fucking perfectttt. View this image ›
Valerie Macon / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10515820 4. Beyoncé walked on stage — pregnant with twins — with that signature confidence of hers, and owned all of our asses right there in front of the entire Recording Academy. View this image ›
Kevork Djansezian / Getty Images The Grammy winner for Best Urban Contemporary Album and Best Music Video performed two songs off her Grammy nominated album, Lemonade.
ID: 10515861 5. Bey sang “Love Drought” and “Sandcastles,” and she made damn sure to take us on an emotional rollercoaster ride while she did it. 10515957 6. Obviously, people lived for it: View this image ›
Twitter: @Allisonholker ID: 10515927 View this image ›
Twitter: @Thynative ID: 10515939 View this image ›
Twitter: @ConnorFranta ID: 10515943 View this image ›
Twitter: @ConnorFranta ID: 10515948 10. And I honestly can’t say I blame them. Keep slaying, ‘Yonce, there’s a reason we call you Queen. ID: 10515966 Beyonce
